title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

reviews.author: MovieBuff123
reviews.content: Mind-bending and visually stunning. Nolan at his best!

reviews.author: CinemaFanatic
reviews.content: Complex plot, but rewarding if you pay attention.

reviews.author: FilmCritic2022
reviews.content: A masterpiece of modern cinema. The visuals are breathtaking.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

reviews.author: SciFiFan
reviews.content: A groundbreaking movie with stunning visuals and a thought-provoking storyline.

reviews.author: TechLover
reviews.content: A classic that defined the genre. Still amazing!

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

reviews.author: SpaceLover
reviews.content: An epic space adventure with stunning visuals and a deep message.

reviews.author: MovieCritic2022
reviews.content: A thought-provoking journey through space and time.
